bookmarkFolderSelector_rootError.message: You can not create folders in the root folder.

bookmarkFolderSelector_newFolderDialog.message: Enter a name for the new folder

bookmarkFolderSelector_noSelection.message: You need to select a folder.

bookmarkFolderSelector_missing.description: The bookmark folder with the given id does not exist anymore.

command_tabs_aside_description.message: Set the current set of tabs aside

error_bgpNotResponding.message: Error: The background page is not responding.

extension_description.message: Set your tabs aside and store them in your bookmarks.

menu_active-session-indicator.description: Shows the session title of the current active session.

menu_tabs-aside_tooltip.message: Set the tabs of this window aside and create new session

menu_set-aside_tooltip.message: Set the current active session aside.

menu_create-session_tooltip.message: Turn the tabs from this window into a session

option_activeSessions_info.message: Tracks tab changes and updates the bookmarks in realtime while a session is active.

option_windowedSession.message: Open sessions in a new window.
option_windowedSession.description: Should sessions be opened in a new window?

option_tabClosingBehavior_info.message: Controls what happens when you close a tab that is part of an active sessions.

option_asidePinnedTabs_hint.message: pinned tabs that are not part of a session yet

option_browserActionContextIcon.message: Use context color for browser action

option_browserActionContextIcon_info.message: Makes the icon the same color as the native icons. Requires specific Firefox settings.

option_rootFolder.description: The bookmark folder where sessions (bookmark subfolders) will be stored

option_rootFolder_hint.message: Pick the folder where sessions are stored.

option_sessionTitleTemplate_info.message: A list of available variables can be found here.

option_confirmSessionRemoval_info.message: Ask for confirmation before removing a session via the sidebar.

option_lazyLoading_info.message: A restored tabâ€™s content is only loaded when the tab is activated. Recommended for big sessions.

setup_browserAction_text.message: Tabs Aside 3 requires a brief setup before it can be used.

setup_changelog_text.message: Want to know what has changed?

setup_completed_text.message:
Setup completed.
You can further customize your experience via the options page. This includes the option to set the color of the Tabs Aside theme to better match your selected theme.

setup_info_text.message: All settings can be changed at a later time via the options page.

setup_preset_selection_text.message:
Tabs Aside has a feature called 'Active Sessions', which is enabled by default. If enabled the session bookmarks get updated automatically as changes to the tabs occur.
By default each session will have its own window.
Which behavior do you prefer?

setup_root_folder_text.message:
Tabs Aside gives you the option to set tabs aside for later. Those tabs are stored as bookmarks.
This gives you full control over the data and enables synchronization between devices via Firefox Sync.
Tabs Aside requires a bookmark folder for it to store tabs in, each session will be stored in its own subfolder.

setup_skip.message: Skip setup and go to options page

sidebar_nosessions_text1.message: Click the browser action button in your toolbar to set aside your tabs.

sidebar_nosessions_text2.message: Restore them later to pick up where you left off.

sidebar_session_restore.description: Label of the session restore button

sidebar_session_restore_tooltip.message: restore all tabs from this session

sidebar_session_restore_keep.description: Session options (...) menu item to restore a session (non-active) but keep the bookmarks

sidebar_session_remove.description: Session options (...) menu item to remove session

sidebar_session_remove_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this session?

sidebar_session_remove_keep_tabs.message:
This session is currently active.
Do you want to keep the open tabs?

sidebar_session_rename.description: Session options (...) menu item to rename session

sidebar_session_details.description: Session options (...) menu item to show session details

sidebar_session_details_modal_title.description: Title of the modal window showing session details in the sidebar

sidebar_session_details_index.description: Position of the bookmark within the parent folder

sidebar_session_details_created.description: date the session folder was created

sidebar_tab_open_remove.description: opens the tab and removes it from the session

tab_contextmenu_title.description: the ampersand (&) makes t the access key for this menu item

tab_contextmenu_add_and_set_aside.description: a single ampersand (&) marks the next character as an access key for this item

tab_error_description.message: Tabs Aside was unable to restore this tab.

tab_error_description_privileged.message: Extensions are not allowed to create tabs with privileged URLs. If you still want to access this page you can just copy the URL to the address bar.

tab_error_description_files.message: Unfortunately extensions are not allowed to create tabs with URLs pointing to local files (file:///). You can still access this page by copying the URL to the address bar.

tab_error_description_container.message: The cookie container for this tab does not exist anymore or the container feature is disabled.

tab_error_report.description: Link to GitHub issues, which are English-only
